subject: plums, peaches, and nectarines
body:
i'm thankful we got to celebrate t's birthday the other night.

i'm thankful when i make people laugh. 

i'm thankful for plums, peaches, and nectarines.

i'm thankful that we took a walk to the park where all the roses grow.

i'm thankful that the weather is so perfect right now.

i'm thankful for four day weekends.
